nodes.text: Falrey was a male Human Imperial agent who was present on Tansarii Point Station, working for the Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo around 1 ABY.

Falrey appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
